title: An introduction to keyboards
description: One can't use a computer without a keyboard, at least a virtual one. However, are you familiar with keyboards?

children.value: One can't use a computer without a keyboard, at least a virtual one. However, are you familiar with keyboards?
There are two main types of keyboards: membrane keyboards and mechanical keyboards. Membrane keyboard are more popular now as it's easy to be mass-produced and could meet the need for office work.
However, mechanical keyboards usually have better quality and could last for longer than membrane keyboards, so it's loved by game player.
